languages.text: "Ты мерзок. Я не дарую тебе желанного освобождения — продолжай и дальше страдать и бояться каждой тени".
"You are disgusting. I will not grant you the release you crave so much. May you live on in suffering, fearful of every shadow."
languages.original_text: "Ты мерзок. Я не дарую тебе желанного освобождения — продолжай и дальше страдать и бояться каждой тени".

traits.locale_text: "You are disgusting. I will not grant you the release you crave so much. May you live on in suffering, fearful of every shadow."
"You are disgusting. I will not grant you the release you crave so much. May you live on in suffering, fearful of every shadow."
"You are disgusting. I will not grant you the release you crave so much. May you live on in suffering, fearful of every shadow."
"You are disgusting. I will not grant you the release you crave so much. May you live on in suffering, fearful of every shadow."
"You are disgusting. I will not grant you the release you crave so much. May you live on in suffering, fearful of every shadow."
"You are disgusting. I will not grant you the release you crave so much. May you live on in suffering, fearful of every shadow."

languages.text: « Vous me dégoûtez. Je ne vous accorderai pas la douce délivrance que vous appelez de vos vœux. Je vous souhaite de continuer à vivre dans la souffrance et la crainte. »
languages.original_text: "You are disgusting. I will not grant you the release you crave so much. May you live on in suffering, fearful of every shadow."

traits.locale_text: « Vous me dégoûtez. Je ne vous accorderai pas la douce délivrance que vous appelez de vos vœux. Je vous souhaite de continuer à vivre dans la souffrance et la crainte. »

languages.text: «Me repugna. No le concederé el descanso que tanto anhela. Vivirá atormentado, temiendo cada sombra».
languages.original_text: "You are disgusting. I will not grant you the release you crave so much. May you live on in suffering, fearful of every shadow."

traits.locale_text: «Me repugna. No le concederé el descanso que tanto anhela. Vivirá atormentado, temiendo cada sombra».

languages.text: 「胸糞悪い。君が求めている解放は認められない。あちこちの影に怯えながら、苦しみの中で生き続けるがいい」
languages.original_text: "You are disgusting. I will not grant you the release you crave so much. May you live on in suffering, fearful of every shadow."

traits.locale_text: 「胸糞悪い。君が求めている解放は認められない。あちこちの影に怯えながら、苦しみの中で生き続けるがいい」

languages.text: “你真让我觉得恶心。我可不会赐予你渴望已久的解脱，我愿你活在痛苦之中，惧怕你身边的每个影子。”
languages.original_text: "You are disgusting. I will not grant you the release you crave so much. May you live on in suffering, fearful of every shadow."

traits.locale_text: “你真让我觉得恶心。我可不会赐予你渴望已久的解脱，我愿你活在痛苦之中，惧怕你身边的每个影子。”

languages.text: "Ihr seid ekelhaft. Ich werde Euch die Befreiung, die Ihr so sehr ersehnt, nicht gewähren. Ihr sollt in Qual weiterleben, in Angst vor jedem Schatten."
languages.original_text: "You are disgusting. I will not grant you the release you crave so much. May you live on in suffering, fearful of every shadow."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid ekelhaft. Ich werde Euch die Befreiung, die Ihr so sehr ersehnt, nicht gewähren. Ihr sollt in Qual weiterleben, in Angst vor jedem Schatten."

languages.text: "İğrençsin. Peşinde olduğun kurtuluşu sana bahşetmeyeceğim. Eziyet içinde yaşayıp her gölgeden korkmaya devam edesin."
languages.original_text: "You are disgusting. I will not grant you the release you crave so much. May you live on in suffering, fearful of every shadow."
